name: Trace . . .
description:
You wake up in a gigantic forest. You don't know who you are. You don't know where you are. 

Make your own way through and leave your trace on the ground to leave this place.

Note 1: Loading at launch can be a bit long. Don't worry the game is running correctly

Note 2 : You can play the game only with a Xbox controller. Headphones / earphones are recommanded

WATCH OUT : In game menu, click on the game to make it full-screen and press ESC to quit
